attributes.action: Provide safe accomodation for rough sleepers during the current lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: The health and welfare of rough sleepers is threatened by cold weather. These groups are at particular risk of Covid 19 and should be protected.
attributes.background: Provide suitable and safe accomodation for rough sleepers during the remainder of the pandemic. Currently empty hotels and conference centres could be used for this pupose.

rejection.details:
The Government recently announced £310 million of funding to tackle homelessness, to build on the ongoing ‘Everyone In’ campaign. You can find out more here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-pledges-further-310-million-to-tackle-homelessness

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund increased support the homeless: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553237

Require housing for all homeless people after the coronavirus crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311860

End Homelessness in Britain by adopting and funding the “Housing First” project: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331268
